attributes.action: pull our once great country out of the europen union
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we do not need a europe superstate running our country we should pull out of the european union & use all the money saved to rebuild this country 
we voted to trade with europe not be ruled by them

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
